data.title: Different wife for Franz Josef of Austria
data.meta_description: No, ATL the dual monarchy would not be proposed as neither side would be interested in that (and is pretty likely who the ATL separation will happen earlier...
data.text:
No, ATL the dual monarchy would not be proposed as neither side would be interested in that (and is pretty likely who the ATL separation will happen earlier than the OTL compromise).

Most likely FJ will say something like “You wanted independence? Well, you can have it but Archduke Maximilian must be your new King”...

Ahh I see

Potential Children for Anna/FJ and Sissi/Max

Franz Josef I (b.1830 r.1848 d.1916) m. Anna of Prussia (b.1836 m.1853 d.1918)

Archduchess Sophie Frederike Dorothea Maria Josefa (1854 - 1888)

Archduchess Gisela Anna Marie (1855 - 1948)

Archduchess Marie Valerie Mathilde Amalie (1858 - 1940)

Archduchess Elisabeth Alexandra Caroline (1861 - 1933)

Archduchess Anna Marie Polyxena (1862 - 1910)

Crown Prince Rudolf Franz Karl Josef (1863 - 1938)

Archduchess Frederica Maria Louisa (1866 - 1897)

Stillborn Son (1870)

Archduchess Margarethe Sibylle Catherine (1875 - 1931)

Archduchess Franziska Theresa Josepha (1875 - 1935)

Maximilian I of Hungary (b.1832 r.1868 d.1908) m. Elisabeth in Bavaria (b.1837 m. 1854 d. 1908)

Archduke Maximilian Franz Karl Josef (1855 - 1857)

Archduchess Sophie Frederike Dorothea Maria Maximiliana (1859 - 1935)

Archduchess Louisa Marie Amalie (1859 - 1890)

Archduchess Caroline Elisabeth Helene Marie (1862 - 1869)

Archduchess Maria Theresa Eugenie (1864 - 1920)

Crown Prince Stephen Maximilian Franz Karl (1868 - 1941)

I like it one thing just wanted to clarify is would Hungary have Salic law as it did under the Austrian branch and as it traditionally had. And what form of monarchy would it be? Constitutional or absolute.

I like it one thing just wanted to clarify is would Hungary have Salic law as it did under the Austrian branch and as it traditionally had. And what form of monarchy would it be? Constitutional or absolute.

Most likely a semi Salic law, like Austria and without doubt a constitutional monarchy (Max and Sissi likely would be fine with that)

Most likely a semi Salic law, like Austria and without doubt a constitutional monarchy (Max and Sissi likely would be fine with that)

Interesting, but with the ministers doing all the work, or some leg work from the crown as well?

Interesting, but with the ministers doing all the work, or some leg work from the crown as well?

Most likely the second...

Charlotte would be a better Empress than Sissi, but likely would still make FJ pretty unhappy and is pretty likely who she was unable to have children...[/QUOTE]

To be honest I did read from a Mexican book and tv program that Charlotte,actually had a child out of the marriage,I mean she got pregnant from another man than Max.

I am very sorry,it seems i don't have a clue how to use the editing tools!

Interesting though wasn’t wilhelm I before Anna of Prussia’s family in the succession for orussia?

Nothing, she is not in the line at al and Willy I never liked the austria, just an anedocte

To be honest I did read from a Mexican book and tv program that Charlotte,actually had a child out of the marriage,I mean she got pregnant from another man than Max.

She most likely had a traumatic miscarriage, we should have a POD that prevents that from happening.
